Samsung Repair

Repair Request
We take your privacy extremely seriously, and we will never share or sell your personal information.
Screen Replacement

Accidents are part of life. If your screen is cracked or broken, we will replace it quickly and with no trouble.

Camera Replacement

Phone cameras can take a beating. We will repair cracked or broken lenses and replace any other parts necessary.

Battery Replacement

Sometime the battery starts to lose charge and you need a replacement. We will provide the right battery at the right price.

Water Damage Check

Liquids can be disastrous to phones but don't worry, we are on the case. We'll get your device up and running again.

Charge Port Replacement

Your phone's charge port get the most wear and tear and will sometimes require replacement. Call us.

Device Diagnostic

Let us give your phone a full health check. Our tests will show up any faults and then… we fix them.
